response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly benefit your business. Before we proceed, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase this product, I am willing to sell it to you for $15,000. This is a special discount compared to the market rate and represents a significant saving for you. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 15000}
